com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise.mapping
Class MotionSPRFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise.mapping.MotionSPRFactory

public final class MotionSPRFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Factory class for creating standard motion SPRs.

This element is an undocumented internal feature. It is not intended to be used by applications as it might change or be removed in future versions.

                                           LoadData loadData)
Creates an SPR for the measure / command value update.

Parameters:
robot - robot for which this SPR should b created
loadData - the load mapper
Returns:
created SPR

createsSplineMotionModuleSPR

public static SPR createsSplineMotionModuleSPR(java.lang.String name,
                                               Robot robot,
                                               SunriseMappingToken info,
                                               CommandMapper mapper,
                                               com.kuka.common.params.ParameterSet commandParams,
                                               IMotionControlMode mode,
                                               IMotion motion)
Creates an SPR for the SplineMotionModule.
1. Creates the new SPR for the Motion -> one Motion one SPR
2. Creates the new SplineMotionModule and adds module to the SPR
3. Creates various modules and links their IN- and OutPorts
4. Maps all stop conditions to the SPR, including the default stop condition (MotionFinished).
5. Creates the pause- and cancel-behavior and adds it to the SPR
6. Adds the SPR to the SunriseMappingToken as current SPR

Parameters:
name - Name of the SPR
robot - robot for which this SPR should be created
info - sunrise mapping info
mapper - Mapper
commandParams - Command parameters
mode - Control mode (position, impedance)
motion - the motion
Returns:
created SPR
